title: Content Creation: Monetize Using Social Media Platforms 104
headline: This free online course will show you how to monetize your content using the best tools for social media.
description: In the content creation process, social media can be a helpful resource. It provides a platform to connect directly with many potential clients in person, allowing you to understand more about them and their preferences. If you learn how to use social media for content creation, you will be able to engage your followers, provide insight into your expertise and make money while you do it. This course will show you the way.
courseDescription:
Today's social media platforms have progressed from a fledgling concept to a well-established cultural standard. As a result, almost any business may benefit from social media these days and those not on board risk losing significant amounts of money! According to social media figures from 2019, there are now 3.4 billion users worldwide. That corresponds to around 45% of our current population.

This course will introduce you to different ways to monetize content using social media platforms. It starts by demonstrating how to post and monetize videos on Facebook. Next, you will learn how to upload videos for IGTV and discover the optimal video and thumbnail format. Targeting hashtags automatically utilizing the fully automated software will also be emphasized. You will also learn to get multiple bio links on Instagram using a link tree.

The final section will show you how to monetize and acquire attention from additional sources by uploading the same video to a blog and podcast. You will explore the advantages of utilizing Anchor and how to set up an Anchor account. Enroll in this course to learn how to make money using social media platforms and use that knowledge to expand your business.
